I am still excited about this game, Allen Iverson said. "I feel like I could still play another 48 minutes. The crowd was against us and it was just great playing in that kind of atmosphere. Indeed, nobody, except maybe Sergio Marchionne himself, believed Chrysler could redo its product line so dramatically in 18 months. They just accomplished a tremendous amount of work in a short time, and with limited resources, said Rebecca Lindland, an analyst with IHS Automotive, who admits she was an early doubter.
